title: Reflective Practice Project for Addressing Unplanned Challenging Topics

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social studies teaching ability and classroom management experience
context.additional_context: Case analysis and discussion-based activities to prepare for unpredictable situations in real classroom settings.

learning_goals: Learners can identify five root causes (student/ expertise/curriculum/community/teacher identity issues) when unplanned difficult topics arise.
Learners design strategies to address difficult topics with over 80% accuracy using reflective practice strategies.
Learners develop actionable manuals applicable to real classroom situations through collaborative case analysis with peer teachers.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
